content: I'm glad you found those tips helpful! I've been thinking a lot about my own experiences with performance anxiety, and I realized that attending that one-woman show at the fringe festival in early February really inspired me to face my fears. The actress's performance was so moving and thought-provoking, and it made me want to overcome my own stage fright. Do you have any advice on how to prepare for a performance when you're feeling anxious or nervous?
